title: brianabstact
author: brianabstact
content: Hey I'm Brian an experienced trader for 7 years, currently offering a premium trading signal group on telegram. You might wonder why I decided to open a premium channel. Well not everything in life is about money. At the time you feel you have sharp skills, suddenly money doesn't matter. You suddenly want to focus on making other people successful. I will provide you :Proper Money Management Proper Leverage usageDaily Swing trades and scalp tradesTechnical AnalysisFundamental AnalysisDaily market news updatesWin rate : 90%Monthly return : 800-1200%If you are interested, first week is free. Everything will be shared on telegram. If you feel the benefits you are welcome to continue and join the premium channelMonthly fee : $250 (You will get a 2 week free bonus on top)Lifetime fee : $1500If you are interested send me an email thebugarchannel@gmail.com

comments.author: Issa56
comments.created_time: November 09, 2022, 05:49:54 AMLast edit: November 09, 2022, 02:32:33 PM by Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: brianabstact on November 09, 2022, 12:08:46 AMHey I'm Brian an experienced trader for 7 years, currently offering a premium trading signal group on telegram. You might wonder why I decided to open a premium channel. Well not everything in life is about money. At the time you feel you have sharp skills, suddenly money doesn't matter. You suddenly want to focus on making other people successful. How do you expect us to believe you are having 7 years experience, you should have provided so evidence. A newbie account that was created on November 8, with 1 post and 1 activity is trying to give a signal and he is claiming to be having 7 years experience, I smell scam, you should have posted with your main account, and not create a alt account. Quote from: brianabstact on November 09, 2022, 12:08:46 AMWin rate : 90%Monthly return : 800-1200%If you are interested, first week is free. Everything will be shared on telegram. If you feel the benefits you are welcome to continue and join the premium channelMonthly fee : $250 (You will get a 2 week free bonus on top)Lifetime fee : $1500If you are interested send me an email thebugarchannel@gmail.comI will just recommend everyone to be careful, I don't believe in trading signals, if you want to trade then learn to do your analysis yourself and you don't have to depend on anybody. OP won't lose anything if he gives you wrong signal, you are the one to lose because you are going to pay $250 for monthly fee and $1500 for life time fee and also at the end you might endup losing the amount you are using to trade, so we all have to be very careful and smart.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: brianabstact on November 09, 2022, 12:08:46 AMHey I'm Brian an experienced trader for 7 years, currently offering a premium trading signal group on telegram. You might wonder why I decided to open a premium channel. Well not everything in life is about money. At the time you feel you have sharp skills, suddenly money doesn't matter. You suddenly want to focus on making other people successful. You said that not everything is about the money and that you want to focus on making other people successful, yet you have a premium group in which people have to pay. Interesting Quote from: brianabstact on November 09, 2022, 12:08:46 AMWin rate : 90%Monthly return : 800-1200%Now I am 100% sure that you are full of shit as no trader have that successful trade percentages (at least not in longer period of time), nor the monthly return.
